name: Poinsettia Cocktail
description: This recipe is for "the world's fanciest cranberry juice cocktail." Matthew Ficke of the Columbia Room in Washington, D.C. serves this fruity, effervescent drink during the holiday season and now, so can you.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups unsweetened 100% cranberry juice such as Knudsen Just Cranberry
One 2-inch knob fresh ginger, peeled and sliced
Zest of 1 orange, removed with a vegetable peeler
6 dashes Bar Keep Baked Apple Bitters

recipeInstructions.text: For the Spiced Cranberry Syrup: Heat the cranberry juice sugar, cardamom, star anise, cloves, allspice, ginger, and orange zest in a small saucepan over medium heat, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. Strain through a fine-meshed strainer, discard solids, and reserve.

To make the Punch: Combine the Cointreau, cranberry syrup, and bitters in large bowl. Stir to mix. Fill with ice or a large ice block, top with entire bottle sparkling wine, garnish with lemon slices and serve.
